LanguageData.OE_MechLordRedline.label: grand redline
LanguageData.OE_MechLordRedline.description: Grand Redline mode grant the Chaos Lord an ability to increased combat potential and movespeed.
LanguageData.OE_MechLordVanguard.label: grand vanguard
LanguageData.OE_MechLordVanguard.description: Vanguard program grant the Chaos Lord an ability to reducing incoming damage with small reducing movespeed.
LanguageData.OE_MechLordBlink.label: chaos blink
LanguageData.OE_MechLordBlink.description: Blink device grant the Chaos Lord an ability to teleport the target to a random position not too far from its starting point.
LanguageData.OE_MechLordCamouflage.label: shadow walk
LanguageData.OE_MechLordCamouflage.description: Camouflage device grant the Chaos Lord an ability to activate the inner stealth module which renders the user invisible.
